name.ja: システム・低レベルプログラミング

description.en: System programming, memory management, and performance-critical applications
description.zh: 系统编程、内存管理和性能关键应用
description.ja: システムプログラミング、メモリ管理、パフォーマンス重視アプリケーション

description.en: Write idiomatic C++ code with modern features, RAII, smart pointers, and STL algorithms. Handles templates, move semantics, and performance optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for C++ refactoring, memory safety, or complex C++ patterns.
description.zh: Write idiomatic C++ code with modern features, RAII, smart pointers, and STL algorithms. Handles templates, move semantics, and performance optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for C++ refactoring, memory safety, or complex C++ patterns.
description.ja: Write idiomatic C++ code with modern features, RAII, smart pointers, and STL algorithms. Handles templates, move semantics, and performance optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for C++ refactoring, memory safety, or complex C++ patterns.

description.en: Master Go 1.21+ with modern patterns, advanced concurrency, performance optimization, and production-ready microservices. Expert in the latest Go ecosystem including generics, workspaces, and cutting-edge frameworks. Use PROACTIVELY for Go development, architecture design, or performance optimization.
description.zh: Master Go 1.21+ with modern patterns, advanced concurrency, performance optimization, and production-ready microservices. Expert in the latest Go ecosystem including generics, workspaces, and cutting-edge frameworks. Use PROACTIVELY for Go development, architecture design, or performance optimization.

description.en: Master Rust 1.75+ with modern async patterns, advanced type system features, and production-ready systems programming. Expert in the latest Rust ecosystem including Tokio, axum, and cutting-edge crates. Use PROACTIVELY for Rust development, performance optimization, or systems programming.

description.en: Write efficient C code with proper memory management, pointer arithmetic, and system calls. Handles embedded systems, kernel modules, and performance-critical code. Use PROACTIVELY for C optimization, memory issues, or system programming.
description.zh: Write efficient C code with proper memory management, pointer arithmetic, and system calls. Handles embedded systems, kernel modules, and performance-critical code. Use PROACTIVELY for C optimization, memory issues, or system programming.
